original_title: 死ぬほど大嫌いな上司と出張先の温泉旅館でまさかの相部屋に… 醜い絶倫おやじに何度も何度もイカされてしまった私。
overview: Worst ... I hate it because it's a shared room with my boss ... Emma gets fucked without any means of being threatened by being voyeurized with sleeping pills. title: Somehow I Wound Up Sharing A Hot Spring Hotel Room With My Boss On A Business Trip… He’s So Ugly, But So Hung, And I Can’t Stop Cumming. Ema Futaba
